com.aeoniansoftware.network

Class FieldGameMessageSerializer<X extends IFieldGameMessage>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.jme3.network.serializing.Serializer
      • com.aeoniansoftware.network.FieldGameMessageSerializer<X>

  • public class FieldGameMessageSerializer<X extends IFieldGameMessage>
extends com.jme3.network.serializing.Serializer
    custom jmonkey serializer for our game message class. basicly just calls the de/serialization methods on the message dto class
